body_html:
version counter checking in this PR?

I see no need to add version checking this PR, but it is @apaszke's call. Version checking seems like a small low-level change that will not affect the interface and will only be an issue in rare edge cases. Moreover this PR is blocking further work on distributions: LogNormal, and ConstraintRegistry in probtorch#108.

EDIT I'd be happy to add version checking in a follow-up PR.

body:
> version counter checking in this PR?

I see no need to add version checking this PR, but it is @apaszke's call. Version checking seems like a small low-level change that will not affect the interface and will only be an issue in rare edge cases. Moreover this PR is blocking further work on distributions: `LogNormal`, and `ConstraintRegistry` in https://github.com/probtorch/pytorch/pull/108.

EDIT I'd be happy to add version checking in a follow-up PR.
